properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 e1 e2

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
G
Lord I come to You
Let my heart be changed renewed
Flowing from the grace that I found in You

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Lord I've come to know
The weaknesses I see in me
Will be stripped away
By the power of Your love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hold Me close
Let Your love surround me
Bring me near
Draw me to Your side

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
And as I wait
I'll rise up like the eagle
And I will soar with You
Your Spirit leads me on
In the power of Your love

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Lord unveil my eyes
Let me see You face to face
The knowledge of Your love
As You live in me

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Lord renew my mind
As Your will unfolds in my life
In living every day
By the power of Your love

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Hold us close
Let Your love surround us
Bring us near
Draw us to Your side

verse.name: e2
verse.lines:
And as We wait
We'll rise up like the eagle
And We will soar with You
Your Spirit leads us on
In the power of Your love
